name: Lucky crush N match
description:
The best casino themed puzzle game of it’s kind!

Go match fruits, sevens, bells and bars and become the NR1 High roller!!

Regular slots are fun, but all you need to do is press a button. You don’t need skill. In Lucky crush N match it’s the skill that makes the difference!

Lucky crush N match features:
● Unlike all famous match-3 games we have unlimited levels!
● Lots of great features in the game: Mega vaporizing, fruit Explosions, Jackpot raids!.
● Earn Joker wilds /coins/ hints!
● Multiple kinds of gameplay!
● Nerve wrecking timer mode!
● Logical max moves mode!
● Never ending infinite mode!

Can you beat the highscores and be the NR1 high roller?

I hope you will enjoy this fun game.

A big thank you to all who played this game.

Have fun playing!

Cheers!
